story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Welcome to Pasio, the wonderful paradise
for Trainers!
story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Our beloved Pasio is a wonderful place, where
Trainers compete to be the best and polish each
other’s skills.
story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_0500_10: As you know, our society is able to thrive...
story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_0600_10:
thanks to help from these mysterious creatures
that we call Pokémon.
story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_0700_10:
And a Trainer and a Pokémon who are tied by a
strong bond...
story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Oh! But I’m getting carried away. Please allow
me to introduce myself. My name is Rose, and it is
a pleasure to be here.
story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Now turn your gaze to the Galar region’s greatest
pair—and one of the strongest sync pairs
on Pasio...
story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_1100_10:
It’s time for Champion Leon and Charizard’s
exhibition match!
story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Exhibition or not, I’m battling you with everything
I’ve got. I hope you’re ready!
story_galar_02_17000/2401_1001_1400_10: Bring it on! You know I don’t lose battles, Gloria!
